HomePage.title: The true force that drives us is

AboutPage.missionVisionDesc:
Our mission is to help businesses, institutions and individuals reap the benefits of technology through our innovative software and products. We strive to offer our customers and partners affordable, accessible, and secure technologies in the defense industry and information technologies.
Our vision is to be recognised as an international innovation and R&D center, to help build a sustainable future for the world by developing software and products that will accelerate digitalization globally.
AboutPage.privacyNote: I understand that my data will be held securely in accordance with the <link>privacy policy</link>

values.title: Innovation
values.desc: We believe the key to success is to push the boundaries. This is why we value new and bold ideas above all else.

values.title: Passion
values.desc: We are passionate about what we do. Our passion is the essence of our work and is at the core of everything we do.

values.title: Agility
values.desc: Our agile work model allows us to adapt to change and keep up with the pace of the sectors which we serve.

values.title: Trust
values.desc: Accountability and transparency pave the way for mutual trust. This is why we carry out all our activities within the framework of our ethical values.

timeline.title: BİTES became a 100% subsidiary of ASELSAN. Became Turkiye’s 4th fastest growing technology company. Leading Domestic Defence Industry Brand of the year.
BİTES became a 100% subsidiary of ASELSAN.
Ranked among the top 3 in the Defense Industry sector.
Became one of the top 10 companies in terms of revenue.
First export to Sikorsky Aircraft Corporation.
First export to the Middle East.
ATAK T-129 WBT & VMT program awarded.
Started focusing on defense and aviation industries.

HELSIM I Program-II contract
Company founded
